verses.verse: Then Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest <S%H3548><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> with his brothers <S%H251><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> and built <S%H1129><s%> the Sheep <S%H6629><s%> Gate; <S%H8179><s%> they consecrated <S%H6942><s%> it and hung <S%H5975><s%> its doors. <S%H1817><s%> They consecrated <S%H6942><s%> the wall to the Tower <S%H4026><s%> of the Hundred <S%H3968><s%> [and] the Tower <S%H4026><s%> of Hananel. <S%H2606><s%>

And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him the men <S%H376><s%> of Jericho <S%H3405><s%> built, <S%H1129><s%> and next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them Zaccur <S%H2139><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Imri <S%H566><s%> built. <S%H1129><s%>

Now the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hassenaah <S%H5570><s%> built <S%H1129><s%> the Fish <S%H1709><s%> Gate; <S%H8179><s%> they laid <S%H9529><s%> its beams <S%H9529><s%> and hung <S%H5975><s%> its doors <S%H1817><s%> with its bolts <S%H4514><s%> and bars. <S%H1280><s%>

And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them Meremoth <S%H4822><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uriah <S%H223><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz <S%H6976><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs. <S%H2388><s%> And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Meshezabel <S%H4898><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs. <S%H2388><s%> And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Baana <S%H1195><s%> also made <S%H2388><s%> repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Moreover, next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him the Tekoites <S%H8621><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs, <S%H2388><s%> but their nobles <S%H117><s%> did not support <S%H935><s%> <S%H6677><s%> the work <S%H5656><s%> of their masters. <S%H113><s%>

And Joiada <S%H3077><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Paseah <S%H6454><s%> and Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Besodeiah <S%H1152><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the Old <S%H3465><s%> Gate; <S%H8179><s%> they laid <S%H9529><s%> its beams <S%H9529><s%> and hung <S%H5975><s%> its doors, <S%H1817><s%> with its bolts <S%H4514><s%> and its bars. <S%H1280><s%>

Next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them Melatiah <S%H4424><s%> the Gibeonite <S%H1393><s%> and Jadon <S%H3036><s%> the Meronothite, <S%H4824><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of Gibeon <S%H1391><s%> and of Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> also made <S%H2388><s%> repairs <S%H2388><s%> for the official <S%H3678><s%> seat <S%H3678><s%> of the governor <S%H6346><s%> [of the province] beyond <S%H5676><s%> the River. <S%H5104><s%>

Next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Uzziel <S%H5816><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harhaiah <S%H9170><s%> of the goldsmiths <S%H6884><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs. <S%H2388><s%> And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Hananiah, <S%H2608><s%> one <S%H1121><s%> of the perfumers, <S%H7546><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs, <S%H2388><s%> and they restored <S%H9395><s%> Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Broad <S%H7342><s%> Wall. <S%H2346><s%>

And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them Rephaiah <S%H7509><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hur, <S%H2354><s%> the official <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to them Jedaiah <S%H3042><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harumaph <S%H2739><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs <S%H2388><s%> opposite <S%H5048><s%> his house. <S%H1004><s%> And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Hattush <S%H2407><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hashabneiah <S%H2813><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Harim <S%H2766><s%> and Hasshub <S%H2815><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Pahath-moab repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section <S%H4060><s%> and the Tower <S%H4026><s%> of Furnaces. <S%H8574><s%>

And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Shallum <S%H7967><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hallohesh, <S%H3873><s%> the official <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> made <S%H2388><s%> repairs, <S%H2388><s%> he and his daughters. <S%H1323><s%>

Hanun <S%H2586><s%> and the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of Zanoah <S%H2182><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the Valley <S%H1516><s%> Gate. <S%H8179><s%> They built <S%H1129><s%> it and hung <S%H5975><s%> its doors <S%H1817><s%> with its bolts <S%H4514><s%> and its bars, <S%H1280><s%> and a thousand <S%H505><s%> cubits <S%H520><s%> of the wall <S%H2346><s%> to the Refuse <S%H830><s%> Gate. <S%H8179><s%>

And Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Rechab, <S%H7394><s%> the official <S%H8269><s%> of the district <S%H6418><s%> of Beth-haccherem repaired <S%H2388><s%> the Refuse <S%H830><s%> Gate. <S%H8179><s%> He built <S%H1129><s%> it and hung <S%H5975><s%> its doors <S%H1817><s%> with its bolts <S%H4514><s%> and its bars. <S%H1280><s%>

Shallum <S%H7968><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Col-hozeh, the official <S%H8269><s%> of the district <S%H6418><s%> of Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> the Fountain <S%H9407><s%> Gate. <S%H8179><s%> He built <S%H1129><s%> it, covered <S%H2926><s%> it, and hung <S%H5975><s%> its doors <S%H1817><s%> with its bolts <S%H4514><s%> and its bars, <S%H1280><s%> and the wall <S%H2346><s%> of the Pool <S%H1295><s%> of Shelah <S%H9604><s%> at the king's garden <S%H1588><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the steps <S%H4609><s%> that descend <S%H3381><s%> from the city <S%H5892><s%> of David. <S%H1732><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Nehemiah <S%H5166><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Azbuk, <S%H5802><s%> official <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Beth-zur, made <S%H2388><s%> repairs <S%H2388><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as [a point] opposite <S%H5048><s%> the tombs <S%H6913><s%> of David, <S%H1732><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as the artificial <S%H6213><s%> pool <S%H1295><s%> and the house <S%H1004><s%> of the mighty <S%H1368><s%> men. <S%H1368><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him the Levites <S%H3881><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> [under] Rehum <S%H7348><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Bani. <S%H1137><s%> Next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Hashabiah, <S%H2811><s%> the official <S%H8269><s%> of half <S%H2677><s%> the district <S%H6418><s%> of Keilah, <S%H7084><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> for his district. <S%H6418><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him their brothers <S%H251><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> [under] Bavvai <S%H942><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad, <S%H2582><s%> official <S%H8269><s%> of [the other] half <S%H2677><s%> of the district <S%H6418><s%> of Keilah. <S%H7084><s%>

And next <S%H5921><s%> <S%H3027><s%> to him Ezer <S%H5829><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> the official <S%H8269><s%> of Mizpah, <S%H4709><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section, <S%H4060><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of the ascent <S%H5927><s%> of the armory <S%H5402><s%> at the Angle. <S%H4740><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Baruch <S%H1263><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Zabbai <S%H2079><s%> zealously <S%H2734><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section, <S%H4060><s%> from the Angle <S%H4740><s%> to the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Eliashib <S%H475><s%> the high <S%H1419><s%> priest. <S%H3548><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Meremoth <S%H4822><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uriah <S%H223><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz <S%H6976><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section, <S%H4060><s%> from the doorway <S%H6607><s%> of Eliashib's house <S%H1004><s%> even as far <S%H5704><s%> as the end <S%H8503><s%> of his house. <S%H1004><s%>
And after <S%H310><s%> him the priests, <S%H3548><s%> the men <S%H376><s%> of the valley, <S%H3603><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> them Benjamin <S%H1144><s%> and Hasshub <S%H2815><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of their house. <S%H1004><s%> After <S%H310><s%> them Azariah <S%H5838><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Maaseiah, <S%H4641><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Ananiah <S%H6055><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> beside <S%H681><s%> his house. <S%H1004><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Binnui <S%H1131><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Henadad <S%H2582><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section, <S%H4060><s%> from the house <S%H1004><s%> of Azariah <S%H5838><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the Angle <S%H4740><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as the corner. <S%H6438><s%>

Palal <S%H6420><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Uzai <S%H186><s%> [made repairs] in front <S%H5048><s%> of the Angle <S%H4740><s%> and the tower <S%H4026><s%> projecting <S%H3318><s%> from the upper <S%H5945><s%> house <S%H1004><s%> of the king, <S%H4428><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is by the court <S%H2691><s%> of the guard. <S%H4307><s%> After <S%H310><s%> him Pedaiah <S%H6305><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh <S%H6551><s%> [made repairs.]

And the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants <S%H5411><s%> living <S%H3427><s%> in Ophel <S%H6077><s%> [made repairs] as far <S%H5704><s%> as the front <S%H5048><s%> of the Water <S%H4325><s%> Gate <S%H8179><s%> toward the east <S%H4217><s%> and the projecting <S%H3318><s%> tower. <S%H4026><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him the Tekoites <S%H8621><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section <S%H4060><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of the great <S%H1419><s%> projecting <S%H3318><s%> tower <S%H4026><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as the wall <S%H2346><s%> of Ophel. <S%H6077><s%>

Above <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5921><s%> the Horse <S%H5483><s%> Gate <S%H8179><s%> the priests <S%H3548><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs, <S%H2388><s%> each <S%H376><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of his house. <S%H1004><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> them Zadok <S%H6659><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Immer <S%H564><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of his house. <S%H1004><s%> And after <S%H310><s%> him Shemaiah <S%H8098><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shecaniah, <S%H7935><s%> the keeper <S%H8104><s%> of the East <S%H4217><s%> Gate, <S%H8179><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs. <S%H2388><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Hananiah <S%H2608><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Shelemiah, <S%H8018><s%> and Hanun <S%H2586><s%> the sixth <S%H8345><s%> son <S%H1121><s%> of Zalaph, <S%H6764><s%> repaired <S%H2388><s%> another <S%H8145><s%> section. <S%H4060><s%> After <S%H310><s%> him Meshullam <S%H4918><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Berechiah <S%H1296><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of his own quarters. <S%H5393><s%>

After <S%H310><s%> him Malchijah <S%H4441><s%> one <S%H1121><s%> of the goldsmiths, <S%H6885><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs <S%H2388><s%> as far <S%H5704><s%> as the house <S%H1004><s%> of the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants <S%H5411><s%> and of the merchants, <S%H7402><s%> in front <S%H5048><s%> of the Inspection <S%H4663><s%> Gate <S%H8179><s%> and as far <S%H5704><s%> as the upper <S%H5944><s%> room <S%H5944><s%> of the corner. <S%H6438><s%>

And between <S%H996><s%> the upper <S%H5944><s%> room <S%H5944><s%> of the corner <S%H6438><s%> and the Sheep <S%H6629><s%> Gate <S%H8179><s%> the goldsmiths <S%H6884><s%> and the merchants <S%H7402><s%> carried <S%H2388><s%> out repairs. <S%H2388><s%>
